casebody.data:
BRONSON METHODIST HOSPITAL, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
FARM BUREAU MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY OF MICHIGAN and Farm Bureau General Insurance Company of Michigan, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 157986
COA: 333275 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 2, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion to hold the application for leave to appeal in abeyance for W A Foote Mem. Hosp. v. Mich. Assigned Claims Plan (Docket No. 156622) is considered, and it is GRANTED. We ORDER that the application for leave to appeal the March 27, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals be held in ABEYANCE pending the decision in W A Foote Mem. Hosp .
